api_list.name: Get the latest Gold Prices
api_list.description: Get the latest gold prices in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kuwait-gold-prices.p.rapidapi.com/getLastGoldPrice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kuwait-gold-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the last 5 Gold Prices
api_list.description: It gets the last 5 gold prices in a JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kuwait-gold-prices.p.rapidapi.com/getGoldPricesInKuwait"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
